p: Sesquiterpene from the methanolic extract of the rhizome of C. zedoaria was investigated using TPA-induced inflammation of mouse ears, where furanodiene and furanodienone ( Figure 1J,K) suppressed the TPA-induced inflammation of mouse ears by 75% and 53%, respectively, at a dose of 1.0 Î¼mol, which are effects that are comparable to that of indomethacin [ 58].
